page.title: 13Employment and Trade Unions
page.content: There has been an increase in the overall number of employees during the last year against the national trend,although an individual industrial company has made cuts to its work force. At the present time there is a total of 800 registered unemployed in East Grinstead. Of the workforce 80% work full time, with another 1,300 people being employed on a temporary basis mainly in the building and construction industries. The average annual holiday is 4 weeks. The businesses who replied have very few employees who are Trade Union members.The very infrequent strikes were usually shorter than three weeks and involved problems arising from pay, working conditions and new technology.
